channel.title: Jodie Foster on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Guillermo del Toro, Jodie Foster to Receive Tribute Awards at Toronto Film Festival
item.description: The first wave of honorees for the Sept. 7 gala fundraiser includes Japanese director Hikari and ‘Squid Game’ star Lee Byung-hun.
